EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Basic Ninja Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
While you are centered, you can use your Dexterity modifier to hit. You are proficient with short swords and treat them as Ki weapons.
If another ability allows you to remain centered while wielding other types of melee weapon, then those weapons will also get the benefit of Ninja Training.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Advanced Ninja Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
While you are centered, you can use your Dexterity modifier for damage. You also gain Doubleshot equal to your Dexterity score while wielding a Shuriken.
If another ability allows you to remain centered while wielding other types of melee weapon, then those weapons will also get the benefit of Advanced Ninja Training.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Shadow Veil
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: You focus your Ki and draw shadows around you. You become invisible and 25% incorporeal for one minute. Actions that break invisibility do not remove the incorporeality portion of this effect. Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 6 seconds.

Stance.Name: Shadow Veil
Stance.Description: You become invisible and 25% incorporeal for one minute. Actions that break invisibility do not remove the incorporeality portion of this effect. (Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 6 seconds).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Poisoned Darts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Ki Activate: You spit poisoned darts in a cone before you. Nearby enemies are affected by between 4 and 8 stacks of Ninja Poison.
Ninja Poison: Magical Poison: Target takes 1d4 points of Poison damage (which scales with Melee Power) every 3 seconds for 15 seconds. The target's vulnerability to poison is increased by 5%. This ability can stack up to 20 times. On timer expiration, 4 stacks of Ninja Poison are removed at a time. Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Diversion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Ki Activate: You turn yourself invisible for 1 minute, and create a dummy that attracts the attention of nearby enemies for 30 seconds. For the next 20 seconds, you also gain +5 Sneak Attack Dice and +5 Assassinate DCs. Activation Cost: 50 Ki. Cooldown: 3 minutes
Passive: +5 Melee and Ranged Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Ninja Master
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain +2 Dexterity and +2 Wisdom, +15 Melee and Ranged Power, +5 Sneak Attack Dice, and +10% Fortification Bypass. Any weapon you wield while Centered gains the Vorpal effect. If you have Self Defense, +10 additional Melee Power.
If another ability allows you to remain centered while wielding other types of melee weapon, then those weapons will also gain these effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Sting of the Ninja
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Imbue Toggle: You poison your weapon with a secret mixture. While you are centered, you deal an additional 1d6 Poison damage on hit scaling with 150% of the higher of Melee or Ranged power, any shortsword, kama, or shuriken you wield will inflict your foes with a stack of Ninja Poison on critical hits. (Magical Poison: Target takes 1d4 points of Poison damage every 3 seconds for 15 seconds. The target's vulnerability to poison is increased by 5%. This ability can stack up to 20 times. On timer expiration, 5 stacks of Ninja Poison are removed at a time.)
If another ability allows you to remain centered while wielding other types of melee weapon, then those weapons will also get the benefit of Sting of the Ninja if they are normally Piercing or Slashing weapons. Cooldown: 3 seconds.
